Filters

Source: vignettes/tutorial/helper_filters.Rmd
helper_filters.Rmd

We included some preprocessing functions which help filtering a dataset by time and weekday. This is especially useful for analyzing behavioral data, since behavior tends to differ between weekday and weekends and also between different times.

filter_daytime

You can filter your dataset by time. You will get every day with times inside the interval:

df = add_time(studentlife_small, utc_col = "timestamp")
filter_daytime(df, from_time = "06:00:00", until_time = "09:00:00")

filter_weekday

You can filter your dataset by a given time frame (e.g. from Monday 6am to Friday 6pm):

df = add_time(studentlife_small, utc_col = "timestamp")
df = add_weekday(df, utc_col = "timestamp")
filter_weekday(df, from_day = "Mon", from_time = "06:00:00", until_day = "Fri", until_time = "18:00:00")

Contents

  • filter_daytime
  • filter_weekday
